Translations.Text: kalet rusuluhum efi-llahi sekkun fatiri-ssemavati vel'ard. yed`ukum liyagfira lekum min zunubikum veyuehhirakum ila ecelim musemma. kalu in entum illa beserum misluna. turidune en tesudduna `amma kane ya`budu abauna fe'tuna bisultanim mubin

kalet lehum rusuluhum in nahnu illa beserum mislukum velakinne-llahe yemunnu `ala mey yesau min `ibadih. vema kane lena en ne'tiyekum bisultanin illa biizni-llah. ve`ale-llahi felyetevekkeli-lmu'minun
vema lena ella netevekkele `ale-llahi vekad hedana subulena. velenasbiranne `ala ma azeytumuna. ve`ale-llahi felyetevekkeli-lmutevekkilun
vekale-llezine keferu lirusulihim lenuhricennekum min ardina ev lete`udunne fi milletina. feevha ileyhim rabbuhum lenuhlikenne-zzalimin
velenuskinennekumu-l'arda mim ba`dihim. zalike limen hafe mekami vehafe ve`id
miv veraihi cehennemu veyuska mim main sadid
yetecerra`uhu vela yekadu yusiguhu veye'tihi-lmevtu min kulli mekaniv vema huve bimeyyit. vemiv veraihi `azabun galiz
meselu-llezine keferu birabbihim a`maluhum keramadin-steddet bihi-rrihu fi yevmin `asif. la yakdirune mimma kesebu `ala sey'. zalike huve-ddalalu-lbe`id
elem tera enne-llahe haleka-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakk. iy yese' yuzhibkum veye'ti bihalkin cedid

veberazu lillahi cemi`an fekale-ddu`afau lillezine-stekberu inna kunna lekum tebe`an fehel entum mugnune `anna min `azabi-llahi min sey'. kalu lev hedane-llahu lehedeynakum. sevaun `aleyna ecezi`na em saberna ma lena mim mehis

vekale-sseytanu lemma kudiye-l'emru inne-llahe ve`adekum va`de-lhakki veve`attukum feahleftukum. vema kane liye `aleykum min sultanin illa en de`avtukum festecebtum li. fela telumuni velumu enfusekum. ma ene bimusrihikum vema entum bimusrihiy. inni kefertu bima esraktumuni min kabl. inne-zzalimine lehum `azabun elim
veudhile-llezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu halidine fiha biizni rabbihim. tehiyyetuhum fiha selam
elem tera keyfe darabe-llahu meselen kelimeten tayyibeten keseceratin tayyibetin asluha sabituv vefer`uha fi-ssema
tu'ti ukuleha kulle hinim biizni rabbiha. veyadribu-llahu-l'emsale linnasi le`allehum yetezekkerun
vemeselu kelimetin habisetin keseceratin habisetin-ctusset min fevki-l'ardi ma leha min karar
yusebbitu-llahu-llezine amenu bilkavli-ssabiti fi-lhayati-ddunya vefi-l'ahirah. veyudillu-llahu-zzalimine veyef`alu-llahu ma yesa
